divs: Sighting DetailsWe were watching the first thunderstorm of the year when we noticed a light that was moving between us and the storm. At first we thought that it was an airplane but then noticed that it was to low and moving in a non ballistic state. It would hover, then change color, then move again. We're not sure if it was a drone with a bright color changing light or if it was actually a U.F.O. but we've never witnessed any drones in the area.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Grants Pass
There were no other sightings in Grants Pass on or around March 30th 2013
Summary: Watching Thunderstorm when we saw a bright moving light changing color & direction..
